reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on identifying unique architectural features, floor materials, and built-in furniture configurations, especially for distinguishing between similar room types (e.g., the four bedrooms and the three bathrooms). The public area (Desc_1, 2, 3) was identified by the combination of glossy tile and wood laminate flooring, and the presence of a specific white console/altar area (Image_3). The bathrooms were separated by tile color (Bathroom 1: blue/dark tiles, Bathroom 2: large gray tiles, Master Bath: white/gray tiles with dark wood vanity). Bedrooms were differentiated by floor type (warm wood vs. light gray laminate), presence of a balcony (Image_8), and specific built-in features (desk vs. glass display cabinets). Desc_10/11 and Desc_12/13, and Desc_5/6 and Desc_14/15 were confirmed as different views of the same respective rooms, ensuring a consistent 1:1 mapping across all 16 items.

matching_result_list.evidence: Wide view of the living area showing the large L-shaped sofa, glossy tile floor, and the highly detailed coffered ceiling with ample lighting.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 大面採光(落地窗與陽台門), 良好通風(客廳連接陽台可對流), 規劃方正(沙發電視動線順暢), 公私分明(客餐廳集中在前區), 天花造型燈充足(多組嵌燈與間接照明), 地坪易清潔(大尺寸拋光磚), 家具尺寸寬裕(可放大型L型沙發與大茶几), 已裝冷氣(天花出風口可見)

matching_result_list.evidence: Alternative view of the public area, confirming the open layout, multi-point lighting, and showing the transition from tile to wood flooring near the dining space.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 開放式公領域(客餐廳連成一線適合家庭活動), 多點照明(筒燈+格柵燈光均勻), 收納展示櫃(牆面木作櫃可收納與展示), 餐廳空間充足(可容納四到六人餐桌), 動線順暢(由玄關到客廳餐廳無明顯阻隔), 隔音潛力佳(厚實門片與木作有助減噪)

matching_result_list.evidence: Focuses on the dining area, clearly showing the floor material change and the large white console/cabinet suitable for a dining/worship area (拜拜區).

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光良好(靠近玻璃門自然光充足), 用餐與拜拜區分明(餐桌與神明桌各自獨立), 地坪異材質分區(客廳磚與餐廳木地板清楚劃分功能), 餐邊櫃實用(可放餐具與小家電), 動線寬敞(餐桌周遭預留行走空間), 天花高度舒適(平頂加局部降板不壓迫)

matching_result_list.evidence: Bedroom featuring a light gray laminate floor, a square layout, and a dedicated built-in dark wood desk/work area.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光一般(單面窗戶自然光尚可), 方正格局(床位與書桌擺放規律), 內建書桌工作區(適合上班族與學生), 地板耐用(塑膠木紋地板好保養), 置物空間可再規劃(目前衣櫃較少需自行增設), 隔間門實心木門(有助提升隱私與隔音)

matching_result_list.evidence: Bathroom view showing the sink and a separate brown vanity counter against distinctive dark blue/black tiled walls.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 乾濕分離(洗手台區與淋浴區分開), 檯面收納佳(大型洗手台下方櫃體), 通風可能仰賴機械(未見對外窗), 採光偏弱(主要依賴天花燈), 磁磚防滑設計(地面小尺寸磁磚增加摩擦), 清潔狀況良好(設備與牆面無明顯老舊)

matching_result_list.evidence: Second view of Bathroom 1, focusing on the toilet and the glass shower enclosure, confirming the dry/wet separation.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 獨立淋浴間(玻璃拉門明顯區隔濕區), 乾濕分離佳(馬桶與洗手台在外側保持乾燥), 空間實用(衛浴配備齊全), 通風靠排風(未見窗戶), 容易打理(大面積磁磚牆面與地面)

matching_result_list.evidence: Identified as 'Bathroom 2' due to its large size, modern gray marble-look tiles, and spacious layout, distinct from the blue-tiled bathrooms.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 特大衛浴空間(可同時兩人使用仍寬敞), 乾濕分離(獨立淋浴房), 雙人檯面潛力(長型洗手台櫃體), 收納充足(大容量木作浴櫃), 通風採光有限(看不見對外窗多靠排風), 磁磚更新度高(牆地面灰白磁磚現代感)

matching_result_list.evidence: Dedicated study room dominated by extensive built-in dark wood cabinets (including glass display) and a continuous integrated desk.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光一般(單面小窗), 方正格局(床與衣櫃、書桌排布順直), 內建衣櫃與展示櫃(收納容量佳), 有書桌工作位(適合學生或居家辦公), 地板好保養(耐磨木紋地板), 天花高度舒適(無壓迫感)

matching_result_list.evidence: Identified as the 'Master Bedroom' due to its exceptionally large size, glossy tile floor, and connection to a large window/terrace area.

matching_result_list.evidence: Bedroom with light gray laminate floor and a large built-in wardrobe featuring prominent glass display sections, distinct from other bedrooms.

tag_list: 內建衣櫃與玻璃展示櫃
extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光一般(單面窗+百葉), 內建衣櫃與玻璃展示櫃(收納量大), 地板耐磨(塑木地板), 格局方正易擺家具, 適合作次臥或兒童房(空間足夠放單/雙人床與書桌)
